ingredients.ingredient: 1 (7.2 ounce) package Original Snack Factory® Pretzel Crisps®
1 (4 ounce) package fresh basil, thinly sliced

cookingTips: Slice cherry tomatoes just before assembling to maintain freshness
Pat tomatoes dry to prevent pretzel crisps from becoming soggy
Assemble bites close to serving time for best texture
enrichment.coachingPrompt: What's the best way to prevent moisture from the tomatoes from softening the pretzel crisps?
